app_description: AMC is a premium streaming bundle featuring world class originals award winning series and exclusive movies made just for you. Enjoy full access to AMC s critically acclaimed originals the spine tingling horror of Shudder captivating dramas mysteries from Sundance Now and culture defining movies from IFC Films Unlimited. Thousands of hours of curated content all in one place with new shows and movies added every week. AMC Exclusive Features: The Ultimate Fan Destination for The Walking Dead Universe and Anne Rice s Immortal Universe with bonus episodes collections and specials not available anywhere else. Dive into full seasons of critically acclaimed series such as Mad Men Dark Winds Interview with The Vampire Gangs of London Orphan Black and more. Full access to SHUDDER the leading home for horror thriller and supernatural entertainment including new spine tingling movies iconic scares and exclusive fan favorite franchises like Creepshow V H S and The Last Drive In with Joe Bob Briggs. Discover the best suspenseful dramas and mysteries from around the world with SUNDANCE NOW including A Discovery of Witches Riviera The Bureau and the True Crime Story franchise. Indulge in award winning independent films including festival favorites and star studded indie darlings with IFC FILMS UNLIMITED. Access to popular live TV networks like AMC plus streaming only exclusives including The Walking Dead Channel. AMC delivers more of what you want less of everything else. Start streaming AMC today! For help with AMC please visit support.amcplus.com For our Terms of Use visit amcplus.com terms For our Privacy Policy visit amcplus.com privacy
